### Module Responsibility

| Module | Responsibility |
|--------|---------------|
| **composeApp** | App entry point, main navigation, global DI setup |
| **ui-*** | Feature UI screens, ViewModels, local state |
| **navigation** | Navigation destinations, Navigator class, graphs |
| **domain** | Use case interfaces, business rules |
| **domain-impl** | Use case implementations |
| **data** | Repository implementations, data sources |
| **network** | Ktor client setup, API endpoints |
| **common-model** | Shared data models, domain entities |
| **common-resources** | Compose resources, theme, colors, strings |
| **buildConfig** | Build-time configuration values |
| **global-loader-manager** | App-wide loading state |
| **remote-config** | Firebase Remote Config wrapper |

## ğŸŒ Platform Abstraction

### expect/actual Pattern

```

## ğŸ”„ Data Flow Example

Complete flow for fetching and displaying data:

```
1. User Action
   â”‚
   â–¼
2. Screen emits UiAction
   â”‚  Button(onClick = { onAction(UiAction.LoadData) })
   â–¼
3. ViewModel receives action
   â”‚  fun onUiAction(action: UiAction) {
   â”‚    when (action) {
   â”‚      LoadData -> loadData()
   â”‚    }
   â”‚  }
   â–¼
4. ViewModel updates state (loading)
   â”‚  _state.update { it.copy(isLoading = true) }
   â–¼
5. ViewModel calls UseCase
   â”‚  val result = getUserUseCase(userId)
   â–¼
6. UseCase calls Repository
   â”‚  suspend fun invoke(userId: String) =
   â”‚    repository.getUser(userId)
   â–¼
7. Repository calls Network
   â”‚  override suspend fun getUser(id: String) =
   â”‚    runCatching { api.fetchUser(id) }
   â–¼
8. Ktor makes HTTP request
   â”‚  client.get("/users/$id")
   â–¼
9. Response flows back up
   â”‚  Repository -> UseCase -> ViewModel
   â–¼
10. ViewModel updates state (success/error)
    â”‚  result.onSuccess { data ->
    â”‚    _state.update { it.copy(
    â”‚      isLoading = false,
    â”‚      data = data
    â”‚    )}
    â”‚  }
    â–¼
11. Compose observes state change
    â”‚  val state by viewModel.state.collectAsState()
    â–¼
12. UI recomposes with new data
    â”‚  if (state.isLoading) Loader()
    â”‚  else Text(state.data)
```

```
